roles.name: Engineer, Backend Developer
roles.description: Our team worked on making an internal search engine for advisors and support staff to aid their work. The project focused on using AI and various NLP techniques to achieve said goal. I mainly did development work on the backend but was also assigned to manage some of our Azure infrastructure and helping out my fellow summer interns getting their development environments set up

roles.name: Software Engineer, Full Stack
roles.description:
Full-time during summer followed by part-time work.

Worked on Ponder - An application for logical analysis. I was responsible for modelling the database as well as developing an API for reading and writing analyses.

In addition to this I did some work on the frontend. I mostly worked on "my page"; A Google Drive-like interface enabling users to access, share and create analyses.
